data.text: Ani yeroo hunda Waaqayyoon nan eebbisa;
Lubbuun koo Waaqayyoon boonti;
Na wajjin Waaqayyoof ulfina kennaa;
Waaqayyoon nan barbaaddadhe; innis deebii naa kenne;
Warri gara isaa ilaalan ni ifu;
Hiyyeessi kun ni iyye; Waaqayyos isa dhagaʼe;
Ergamaan Waaqayyoo naannoo warra Waaqa sodaatanii
Akka Waaqayyo gaarii taʼe mee miʼeeffadhaa ilaalaa;
Isin qulqulloonni isaa Waaqayyoon sodaadhaa;
Leenci saafelli iyyuu waa ni dhaba; ni beelaʼas;
Yaa ijoollee ko, kottaa na dhagaʼaa;
Namni jireenya jaallatu, kan bara gaarii arguudhaafis
Arraba kee waan hamaa irraa,
Hammina irraa deebiʼi; gaarii hojjedhu;
Iji Waaqayyoo qajeeltota irra jira;
yaadannoo isaanii lafa irraa balleessuudhaaf,
Qajeeltonni gargaarsaaf iyyatu; Waaqayyos isaan dhagaʼa.
Waaqayyo warra garaan isaanii cabetti dhiʼoo dha;
Rakkinni nama qajeelaa baayʼee dha;
lafee isaa hunda ni eega;
Hamoota hamminatu ajjeesa;
Waaqayyo lubbuu tajaajiltoota isaa ni fura;
